bookTitle: Danny Chalmers is THE PRINCIPAL (Danny Chalmers Series, #1)
plot: So Principal Leymore gave me the keys to theschool one day because he was sick. I was just supposeto open the doors for everyone—that’s it! Butcrazy Ms. Winless got all loopy and forced me to beprincipal for the day. At first I didn't want to, but then I felt the power!I got to tell everyone what to do! Even my olderbrother Ronny (who is a big jerk by the way) had tolisten to me! But like pretty much every grown uplikes to say: It was all fun and games until…LINK TO THE VIDEO PREVIEW:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hqWzj3...
